title: Return Rakath's Gold
content:
ss the check to keep 5000 gold.

How to unlock Return Rakath's Gold

Rakath in Counting House Vault.

Return Rakath's Gold Rewards

400 XP Rewards: Counting house vault key n 9 roughly 2600 gold Vault number nine is located at the back of the big vault, and rewards "elegant studded leather" wich is light armor with base AC of 14, and the ambusher perk.

Return Rakath's Gold Notes & Tips

There's a tadpole specimen in High-security safe No.6, don't forget to pick it up. Notes & tips go here
